reviewtext: I've long been a shortwave fan, but the price of shortwave units has seemed prohibitive to me until I found this Sangean unit.  The reception is surprisingly good for something so small and portable.  It's attractive enough enough that I can leave it in the guest bedroom, on the nightstand for the use of my guests, and small enough that I can take it with me when I travel.Naturally you're not going to get a lot of power out of it, but I've had much larger, more expensive shortwave units which performed at about the same level, so I have no complaints with the Sangean.  It was a good buy.
